name: lap3-project
description: # To clone the repo ``` git clone git@github.com:tryingbiomedeng/lap3-project.git cd project-repo git submodule init git submodule update ``` # To update submodule ``` git submodule update --remote ```

scripts.prebuild: cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run start
